reviewText:
warning if you think this is a horror movie in the mould of the bbfc video nasties, then you will be disappointed. So what is it?,classic british softcore with a token horror storyline,but it is also an iconic and very hard to get pre-cert video. Still not interested,well its directed by Linsay Honey aka Ben Dover and features his wife Linzi Drew, who was a very popular model in 80's british mens magazines along with a bevy of british models from the time.
On the down side,picture quality is no better than vhs and looks like it was mastered from a vhs tape [a few shooting star lines on the picture], but I think it was shot on video anyway ,so even if it had been mastered from the orginal tape,the picture would not be a lot better.
WOULD HAVE GIVEN IT 5 STARS IF THE PICTURE HAD BEEN A BIT BETTER AND A FEW EXTRAS WOULD HAVE BEEN NICE.
